resources.string: Minesweeper is a single-player video game. The object of the game is to clear an abstract minefield without detonating a mine. The game has been written for many system platforms in use today, including the Minesweeper for the Windows platform, which has come bundled with versions of the operating system from 3.1 and on. Contrary to the beliefs of some, Minesweeper cannot always be solved with 100% certainty, and may require the occasional use of probability to flag the square most likely to have a mine. In other words, one must sometimes guess to solve a minesweeper puzzle.
